title: "Unspecified Error"
body:
I have been getting a http request error throughout today.
After finally fixing it, as it was applying patches I get an error saying 
"Unspecified Error"
Riot Customer Support is slow and I have not received a response to my ticket.
Any help?

replies.body: I'd like to try and help!  At what percent in the patcher are you receiving the unspecific error?  This can help me figure out what's going on, so let me know!
